original: 《 輔臣 》　　高行動力的輔佐大臣能有效地協助管理國家。　　妥善選擇武將擔任內政、人事、謀略大臣；　　也別忘了適度授權，讓各輔臣更有效率進行工作！
text: "Assistant Minister" 　　High-action auxiliary ministers can effectively assist in the management of the country.　　 Properly choose military commanders to serve as ministers of internal affairs, personnel, and strategy; 　　 don’t forget to authorize moderately so that the ministers can work more efficiently!
